BI Solution Corporation, Ho Chi Minh

work.summary: Technical Audience Marketing Manager, Developer & Platform Evangelism Group
work.desc:
Mission: Scaling up Microsoft technical audience and community foundation in Vietnam with End-users, Non-pro/Pro Developers/IT Professionals and Influencers
1> Strategic and execution planning for Microsoft technical audience marketing in Vietnam
2> Assisting to Microsoft DPE director for all events and activities management
3> Connecting, coordinating and supporting Microsoft MVPs, Gurus and influencers in breadth and deep Vietnam community activities
3> Developing Microsoft technical resources, focus on MS Business Intelligence solution

work.summary: Assistant for Director of Developer & Platform Evangelism Group
work.desc:
1> Assisting to Microsoft DPE Director for Microsoft Student Partners Community development in Vietnam
2> Managing Microsoft DPE events and activities in Vietnam
3> Developing and localizing Microsoft technical resources, especially with Microsoft Business Intelligence solution base on SQL Server, SharePoint Server, Office, Visual Studio and .Net Framework
4> Supporting IT faculties in Vietnam universities within Microsoft supporting programs as MSDN AA, Live@Edu, Microsoft Student Partners, etc.

1> Focus on developing IT student community at Ton Duc Thang University with Microsoft technologies
2> Planning and organizing seminars, workshops and training for students to study Microsoft new technologies
3> Assisting to eGrid Club president in relationship development with Microsoft Vietnam

1> Collecting business requirements and planning for project
2> Developing business website base on PHP & MySQL

education.studyType: Hard Skill Project Management, Project Management
